summary: Years ago, a cruel and merciless nun turned boarding school into a living hell for her students until they could no longer bear the abuse, and she mysteriously disappeared. Now the alumnae are being brutally murdered one by one.
cast: Anita Briem|Belén Blanco|Manu Fullola|Alistair Freeland|Cristina Piaget|Paulina Gálvez|Natalia Dicenta|Lola Marceli|Teté Delgado|Oriana Bonet|Katrine Romming|Maia Jenkinson|Joana Rañé|Gemma Martínez|Meritxell Santamaria|Montse Pla|Giles Cooper|Brendan Price|Jim Arnold|Ludovic Tattevin|Alexia Iborra|Anna Vives
title: La monja
